Q.1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRADE*  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 4. TOP THREE GRADES 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY*  1. UNDER 20 YEARS OF AGE 2. 20 TO 24 3. 25 TO 29 4. 30 TO 34 5. 35 TO 37 6. 38 OR OVER 0. NO ANSWER
Q.3. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED, LIVING WITH WIFE ON OR NEAR POST 3. MARRIED, WIFE NOT LIVING NEAR POST 4. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 5. WIDOWED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.4. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL*  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 9. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.5. HOW LONG HAVE YOU SERVED IN THE ARMY* E. IF YOU HAVE SERVED PREVIOUSLY IN THE ARMY, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE A NATIONAL GUARDSMAN, GIVE THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT ENTERED THE ARMY.  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 6. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO 4 YEARS 7. OVER 4 YEARS UP TO 5 YEARS 8. OVER 5 YEARS 9. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.6. CHECK ALL THE BRANCHES OF THE SERVICE YOU HAVE SERVED IN DURING THIS WAR, INCLUDING THE ONE YOU ARE IN NOW. (AIR CORPS, ENGINEERS, QUARTERMASTER CORPS, MEDICAL DEPARTMENT, SIGNAL CORPS, TRANSPORTATION CORPS, ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT, CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE, MILITARY POLICE, INFANTRY, FIELD ARTILLERY, COAST ARTILLERY OR AAA, ARMORED FORCE OR TD, DEML (STATION COMPLEMENT), OTHER)  1. ONE BRANCH 2. TWO BRANCHES 3. THREE BRANCHES 4. FOUR BRANCHES 5. FIVE BRANCHES 6. SIX BRANCHES 7. SEVEN BRANCHES 8. EIGHT BRANCHES 9. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.7. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF PHYSICAL CONDITION WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE IN AT THE PRESENT TIME*  1. VERY GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 2. GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 3. FAIR PHYSICAL CONDITION 4. POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 5. VERY POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.8A. AS FAR AS YOU KNOW, ARE YOU NOW CLASSIFIED BY THE ARMY AS PHYSICALLY FIT FOR OVERSEAS DUTY*  1. YES 2. NO 3. I DON,T KNOW 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.8B. IN YOUR OWN OPINION, ARE YOU PHYSICALLY FIT FOR OVERSEAS DUTY*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.9. DO YOU KNOW WHAT YOUR OWN SCORE IS UNDER THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (POINT SYSTEM) FOR DECIDING WHICH MEN ARE ELIGIBLE TO BE DECLARED SURPLUS*  ANP (ACTUAL SCORE) 01. 1 POINT . . . 93. 93 POINTS 94.94-99 POINTS 95.100-109 POINTS 96.100-119 POINTS 97.120 POINTS AND OVER 98.NO, I DO NOT KNOW WHAT MY POINT SCORE IS 99.NO ANSWER 00.NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.10. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NOW* Z. IF IN AIR FORCE NOW (CODES 01-03); IF IN GROUND FORCES OR SERVICE FORCES NOW (CODES 11-31).  01. FLYING JOB 02. GROUND CREW, AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE AND REPAIR 03. SOME OTHER GROUND JOB 11. ENGINEERS 12. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 13. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 14. SIGNAL CORPS 15. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 16. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 17. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 18. MILITARY POLICE 21. INFANTRY 22. FIELD ARTILLERY 23. COAST ARTILLERY OR AAA 24. ARMORED FORCE OR TD 31. DEML (STATION COMPLEMENT) 41. OTHER 98. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.11. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARM OR BRANCH*  1. VERY WELL SATISFIED 2. FAIRLY WELL SATISFIED 3. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.12. (A) WHAT IS YOUR MAIN ARMY DUTY AT PRESENT* (B) IF YOU ARE NOT WORKING ON A REGULAR JOB NOW, HOW LONG HAS IT BEEN SINCE YOU HAD A REGULAR JOB (CODES 03-10):  01. I AM WORKING ON A REGULAR JOB 02. I AM TAKING TRAINING NOW OR GOING TO SCHOOL 03. I DON,T HAVE ANY REGULAR DUTIES NOW, NO ANSWER TO PART B 04. 1 WEEK OR LESS 05. OVER 1 WEEK UP TO 2 WEEKS 06. OVER 2 WEEKS UP TO 3 WEEKS 07. OVER 3 WEEKS UP TO 4 WEEKS 08. OVER 4 WEEKS UP TO 5 WEEKS 09. OVER 5 WEEKS UP TO 6 WEEKS 10. OVER 6 WEEKS 99. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.13. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE IMPORTANCE OF THE WORK YOU ARE DOING RIGHT NOW AS COMPARED WITH OTHER JOBS YOU MIGHT BE DOING IN THE ARMY*  1. IT IS AS IMPORTANT AS ANY OTHER JOB I COULD DO 2. IT IS FAIRLY IMPORTANT, BUT I COULD DO MORE IMPORTANT WORK 3. IT HARDLY SEEMS IMPORTANT AT ALL 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.14. DOES THE ARMY JOB YOU NOW HAVE GIVE YOU A CHANCE TO USE YOUR SKILL AND EXPERIENCE*  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.15. WOULD YOU CHANGE TO SOME OTHER ARMY JOB IF GIVEN A CHANCE*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.16. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE AMOUNT OF WORK YOU HAVE TO DO*  1. I HAVE TOO MUCH TO DO, BUT MOST OF IT IS NECESSARY 2. I HAVE TOO MUCH TO DO AND A LOT OF IT IS UNNECESSARY 3. I HAVE ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF WORK TO DO 4. I AM NOT KEPT VERY BUSY, BUT I DON,T MIND SITTING AROUND 5. I DON,T HAVE ENOUGH TO DO, AND IT GETS PRETTY TIRESOME SITTING AROUND 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.17. HOW SATISFIED OR DISSATISFIED ARE YOU WITH YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB*  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.18. WOULD YOU HONESTLY SAY THAT YOU USUALLY PUT ALL YOU HAVE INTO YOUR REGULAR ARMY DUTIES, OR DO YOU USUALLY JUST WORK HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY*  1. I USUALLY PUT ALL I HAVE INTO IT 2. I USUALLY WORK HARD BUT I COULD DO MORE 3. I USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.19. IN YOUR OPINION IS YOUR PRESENT UNIT EFFICIENT* THAT IS, IS IT RUN SO THAT THE ARMY GETS THE MOST OUT OF IT*  1. YES, OUR OUTFIT IS VERY EFFICIENT 2. YES, OUR OUTFIT IS PRETTY EFFICIENT 3. YES, BUT THERE IS SOME WASTED WORK OR IDLE TIME 4. NO, THERE IS A LOT OF USELESS WORK AND CONFUSION 5. NO, THERE ISN,T ENOUGH WORK TO KEEP US ALL BUSY 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.20. WERE YOU EVER OVERSEAS OR STATIONED OUTSIDE OF THE 48 STATES IN THIS WAR*  1. NO (NON-RETURNEES) 2. YES (OVERSEAS RETURNEES) P. IF YOU WERE OVERSEAS IN THIS WAR OR STATIONED OUTSIDE OF THE UNITED STATES, ANSWER QUESTIONS 21-34. IF NOT, SKIP TO QUESTION 35. P. TO BE ANSWERED BY OVERSEAS RETURNEES ONLY:

Q.21. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN BACK IN THE STATES (COUNT FROM THE MONTH YOU ACTUALLY ARRIVED BACK IN THE UNITED STATES)*  1. 1 MONTH OR LESS BACK IN THE STATES 2. OVER 1 MONTH UP TO 2 MONTHS 3. OVER 2 MONTHS UP TO 3 MONTHS 4. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 5. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 6. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 12 MONTHS 7. OVER 12 MONTHS UP TO 18 MONTHS 8. OVER 18 MONTHS 0. Q.20 CHECKED YES, NO ANSWER TO Q.21 9. INAPPLICABLE (NON-RETURNEES)

Q.22. WERE YOU SENT BACK TO THE STATES UNDER THE ROTATION PLAN OR FOR SOME OTHER REASON*  1. I WAS SENT BACK UNDER THE ROTATION PLAN 2. I WAS SENT BACK FOR SOME OTHER REASON 3. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE (NON-RETURNEES) 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.23. IN WHAT OVERSEAS THEATER OR AREA DID YOU LAST SERVE*  01. EUROPEAN THEATER (BRITISH ISLES, FRANCE, GERMANY) 02. MEDITERRANEAN THEATER (ITALY, NORTH AFRICA) 03. CARIBBEAN, PANAMA 04. SOUTHWEST PACIFIC AREA (AUSTRALIA, NEW GUINEA, PHILIPPINES) 05. SOUTH PACIFIC BASE COMMAND (NEW CALEDONIA, GUADALCANAL, ETC.) 06. CENTRAL PACIFIC BASE COMMAND (HAWAII, KWAJALEIN, SAIPAN, ETC.) 07. ALASKA, ALEUTIANS 08. MIDDLE EAST (CAIRO, PALESTINE, IRAN) 09. CHINA, BURMA, INDIA 10. OTHER PLACE 99. INAPPLICABLE (NON-RETURNEES) 00. NO ANSWER

Q.24. HAVE YOU BEEN IN COMBAT OR UNDER ENEMY FIRE IN THIS WAR*  1. NO 2. YES, I HAVE BEEN UNDER ENEMY FIRE, BUT NOT IN ACTUAL COMBAT 3. YES, I HAVE BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT 4. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE (NON-RETURNEES) 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.25. KNOWING WHAT YOU DO NOW, HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT HAVING COME BACK TO THE U.S.*  1. I WISH I HADN,T COME BACK 2. I WOULD RATHER HAVE COME BACK JUST FOR A FURLOUGH AND THEN RETURNED TO MY OLD OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. I AM GLAD I CAME BACK 4. SOMETHING ELSE 5. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE (NON-RETURNEES) 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.33A. (OVERSEAS RETURNEES) HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT SERVING OVERSEAS AGAIN*  Q.41A. (NON-RETURNEES) HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT SERVING OVERSEAS*  1. I WANT TO GET OVERSEAS (AGAIN) AS SOON AS POSSIBLE 2. I,M READY TO GO WHENEVER I,M NEEDED 3. I,D LIKE TO STAY IN THE U.S. FOR A FEW MONTHS, BUT THEN I,LL BE READY TO GO ANYWHERE 4. I DON,T WANT TO GO OVERSEAS (AGAIN) 5. NO ANSWER 0.
